property.name: description
property.value: Your coffin, it is opened and the lid has shattered. You only make out the time of your death, year 1004.

property.name: description
property.value: This is a totally shattered statue.

property.name: name
property.value: shattered statue

property.name: description
property.value: This is a goblin skeleton, skull of the skeleton is missing. Most of it's bones are fractured severely.

property.name: name
property.value: goblin skeleton

property.name: description
property.value: This is a severed goblin skull.

property.name: name
property.value: goblin skull

property.name: text
property.value: You notice a big rock blocking one of the doors. You can push the rock by pressing 's'. Try pushing the rock away from the door.

property.name: text
property.value: There is closed door next to you. You can open the door by pressing 'a'.

property.name: text
property.value: You step into the doorway. Room is a servant's resting room and it is in horrible condition. You notice that there is something on the table. Then you get a glimpse of a pesky rat near the skeleton in the corner, that is charging towards you!
